wiwahayehi subha asubha ayanayan, nakath, thithi, karana, yoga saha lagnadiya, asubha thithi wara ha derkana anshaka, asubha ga්raha thathwayan yatathe sidu kala yuthu shanthi karmadiya, wiwahayehi subha asubha daiwagnyayangen wimasa sitiya yuthu bawa ha daiwagnyayan kara elambaiya yuthu nathahoth yayuthu aakaraya, daiwagnyaya wisin thathkala ga්rahacharanukulawa wiwahayehi subha asubha wisandiya yuthu aakaraya, aputha්ri waidhawya yoga nohoth daruwan hata noganna yoga, ambausami dedenage bhagya sampath dakwana yoga, swamiyage ho bharyawage nasima dakwana yoga, swamiyage ho bharyawage mawpiyan nathiwima kerehi balapana yoga, ambausami dedenage jiwathwana nowana bawa dakwena yoga, swamiyage ho bharyawage ninditha bawa wimasana yoga, sharirika belahinathawan ho wikalanga sahitha thathwayan wimasana yoga, dikkasadayehi chudithaya bawata swamiya ho bharyawa pathwana yoga, bala wiyehi dima wandambau wima ho bala apacharayanta lakwana yoga, panchakama sampath nathahoth rupa, shabdha, gandha, rasa saha shparsha yana sampath nolabana yoga, kanyanga wibhagaya, wisha kanya ga්raha yoga, pa්rathama aarthawaye nakath pala, dina pala, iriyapatha pala saha rudhira pala da wiwahayak sidu kirimata pa්ramanawath porondam ganana da stha්rintama anukulawa nathahoth aarthawaya mulkara wiwaha nakath sadiya yuthu bawa da yana athi wishala kshetha්rayaka wihidi athi porondam parikshawe di wimasa baliya yuthu pa්radhana karunu kerehi mema pa්rayogakari wanchanika pudgalayan awadhanaya yomu nokarathi.
